Our Flagship Product

Sri Lanka’s first flight booking app, offering seamless bookings, best prices, and secure payments for a smarter travel experience

iCan Fly

Experience the ease of booking air tickets anytime, anywhere with the iCan Ticketing App.

Simplified steps for quick reservations
Enjoy discounts available just for app users
Stay informed with live flight notifications
Hassle-free and safe transactions

Instant Flight Bookings

Search, compare, and book flights effortlessly from your smartphone.

Best Price Comparisons

Easy Booking Management

Modify, reschedule, or cancel your flights effortlessly, all in one place

OCR Passport Scanning

Quickly scan and auto-fill passport details for a hassle-free booking process
